mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transfer_request(rescued_id, from_shelter_id, to_shelter_id) VALUES (#{rescuedId}, #{fromShelterId}, #{toShelterId})
mapper.select: SELECT tr.id, tr.rescued_id, sh1.username AS from_shelter_name, sh2.username AS to_shelter_name, sh1.latitude AS from_shelter_latitude, sh1.longitude AS from_shelter_longitude, tr.request_status, tr.created_at, tr.updated_at FROM transfer_request tr JOIN shelter sh1 ON tr.from_shelter_id = sh1.id JOIN shelter sh2 ON tr.to_shelter_id = sh2.id WHERE tr.from_shelter_id = #{fromShelterId}

SELECT tr.id, tr.rescued_id, sh1.username AS fromShelterName, sh2.username AS toShelterName, tr.request_status, tr.created_at, tr.updated_at FROM transfer_request tr JOIN shelter sh1 ON tr.from_shelter_id = sh1.id JOIN shelter sh2 ON tr.to_shelter_id = sh2.id WHERE tr.to_shelter_id = #{toShelterId}
